jjil.j2se
Class Error

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      jjil.core.Error
          jjil.j2se.Error
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Error
extends jjil.core.Error

This is the class used to create Strings from Error objects when running under J2SE. The point is that the J2SE localization support is used so the same approach won't work with J2ME, etc.
Ex. usage:
try { ... } catch (Exception ex) { Throwable t = ex.getCause(); if (t instanceof jjil.core.Error) { jjil.j2se.Error e = new jjil.j2se.Error((jjil.core.Error) t); System.out.print(e.toString()); } }
